languages.text: {n}Огромный шпиль невозможно охватить взглядом: истинные размеры гигантского сооружения скрывают тени, которые, кажется, пытаются сомкнуться вокруг вас кольцом каждый раз, когда вы отводите взгляд.{/n}
{n}The gargantuan spire is too large to see in its entirety. Its true proportions are shrouded in shadows, and you feel as if those shadows try to envelop and swallow you whenever you look away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Огромный шпиль невозможно охватить взглядом: истинные размеры гигантского сооружения скрывают тени, которые, кажется, пытаются сомкнуться вокруг вас кольцом каждый раз, когда вы отводите взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The gargantuan spire is too large to see in its entirety. Its true proportions are shrouded in shadows, and you feel like those shadows try to surround and swallow you whenever you look away.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La tour gargantuesque est trop grande pour être observée dans son intégralité. Ses véritables proportions se perdent dans l'ombre et vous avez la sensation que ces ténèbres essaient de vous envelopper et de vous engloutir dès que vous détournez le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gargantuan spire is too large to see in its entirety. Its true proportions are shrouded in shadows, and you feel as if those shadows try to envelop and swallow you whenever you look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La tour gargantuesque est trop grande pour être observée dans son intégralité. Ses véritables proportions se perdent dans l'ombre et vous avez la sensation que ces ténèbres essaient de vous encercler et de vous engloutir dès que vous détournez le regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}眼前的尖塔极其庞大，根本无法看清它的全貌。它巨大的躯体隐藏在阴影之中，当你移开视线时，你不禁感觉它投下的影子仿佛想要裹住你，吞噬你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gargantuan spire is too large to see in its entirety. Its true proportions are shrouded in shadows, and you feel as if those shadows try to envelop and swallow you whenever you look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的尖塔极其庞大，根本无法看清它的全貌。它巨大的躯体隐藏在阴影之中，当你移开视线时，你不禁感觉它投下的影子打算裹住你，吞噬你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}巨大な尖塔は大きすぎて見渡すことができない。塔全体が影で覆われており、目をそらせばその影に取り囲まれ、飲み込まれてしまいそうだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gargantuan spire is too large to see in its entirety. Its true proportions are shrouded in shadows, and you feel as if those shadows try to envelop and swallow you whenever you look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大な尖塔は大きすぎて見渡すことができない。塔全体が影で覆われており、目をそらせばその影に取り囲まれ、飲み込まれてしまいそうだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der riesige Turm ist zu groß, um ihn komplett zu überblicken. Sein wahres Ausmaß ist eingehüllt in Schatten und dich überkommt das Gefühl, dass dich die Schatten umzingeln und verschlucken wollen, sobald du wegschaust.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gargantuan spire is too large to see in its entirety. Its true proportions are shrouded in shadows, and you feel as if those shadows try to envelop and swallow you whenever you look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der riesige Turm ist zu groß, um ihn komplett zu überblicken. Sein wahres Ausmaß ist eingehüllt in Schatten und dich überkommt das Gefühl, dass dich die Schatten umzingeln und verschlucken wollen, sobald du wegschaust.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La ciclópea torre es demasiado grande para abarcarla con la vista. Las sombras te impiden discernir sus verdaderas dimensiones, y tienes la impresión de que esas mismas sombras intentan envolverte y tragarte {mf|entero|entera} cada vez que apartas la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gargantuan spire is too large to see in its entirety. Its true proportions are shrouded in shadows, and you feel as if those shadows try to envelop and swallow you whenever you look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La ciclópea torre es demasiado grande para abarcarla con la vista. Las sombras te impiden discernir sus verdaderas dimensiones, y tienes la impresión de que esas mismas sombras intentan envolverte y tragarte {mf|entero|entera} cada vez que apartas la mirada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Devasa kulenin tamamını görebilmek imkânsız. Gölgeler, gerçek boyutlarını gizliyor; bakışlarını çevirdiğin an seni sarmalayıp yutacaklarmış gibi hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gargantuan spire is too large to see in its entirety. Its true proportions are shrouded in shadows, and you feel as if those shadows try to envelop and swallow you whenever you look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Devasa kulenin tamamını görebilmek imkânsız. Gölgeler gerçek boyutlarını gizliyor ve bu gölgeler, bakışlarını çevirdiğin an seni sarmalayıp yutacakmış gibi hissediyorsun.{/n}
